name: flappy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is flappy is flat and either hits something, or moves from side to side, or waves, often because of the wind: My spaniel has wonderful flappy ears. He had on a big pair of flappy shorts that billowed in the wind.
More examplesFewer examplesAs usual, she was wearing the big, flappy raincoat that had become her trademark.It was his flappy hand gestures that alerted me to the fact that the swimmer had got into difficulty.Penguins are my favourite animals - I just love their flappy feet!
